Hør etter, alle sammen Before we can use JSON in our developing projects, I think it’s necessary to understand the structure of a JSON document or JSON object. Most of the time, I use the terms JSON object and JSON document interchangeably. I think of a document when I read data from a JSON file (stored with the suffix JSON) or the result of a request against a REST API endpoint. I think of a JSON object when I think about the document's structure while reading or writing from or to the document. Trykk her hvis du er et kjøtthue
